install.name: krahSTek Slimbox2 Image Module
install.author: theshark
install.description: The Slimbox2 Module for the krahSTek templates

param.name: group
param.label: Group Name
param.descriptoin: Fill in with uique name to distinguish multiple slimboxes on a single page.

param.name: smallFile
param.label: Small Image
param.description: The filename with extension of the small image that will be displayed

param.name: images
param.label: List of Slimbox Image Files
param.description: The images files that will be opened in the slimbox, include the file extension. Enter one filename per line.

param.name: captions
param.label: List of Slimbox Image Captions
param.description: Enter the caption for each image in the same order as the images, one per line.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
